1011110010001001 1011110000100100 0 -> sum: 0111100010101101, cout: 1
1111001000111110 1001000000100100 1 -> sum: 1000001001100011, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
